page.title: 13St.Davids Lifeboat
page.content: The lifeboat station for St Davids is in St Justinian.The lifeboat is called the 'Joseph Soar' but they may be getting a new and better lifeboat. The coxwain is Freddy John who takes trips round Ramsey Island.Ramsey Sound is one of the most dangerous places on the coast and this is where most accidents happen.The St Davids area where the lifeboat covers is from Fishguard to Angle.A few weeks ago a tanker ran aground and the oil which spilled out killed many Puffins and Giuillemonts.The lifeboat(which went out)was covered in oil.It was washed with special chemicals.Water came from R.A.F.Brawdy in a fire engine.After every call out the lifeboat must be washed down,ready for the next time it is needed.Some of the crew are Rex Lewis,Norman Rowley,Keith Jones,Ken Braders and my dad Malcom Gray.
